title: Online Exam Proctoring and Academic Integrity Management: Enhancing Competencies for Science Field Administrators

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of online learning and exam administration, proficiency in mobile device utilization
context.additional_context: Course for corporate science education administrators to acquire strategies for maintaining academic integrity through mobile-based microlearning in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the operational principles of online proctoring tools (e.g., AI-based behavior analysis, screen-sharing monitoring) and present real-world application cases.
Learners can analyze academic integrity threats (cheating types, technological vulnerabilities) and establish prevention strategies.
Learners can create online assessment operation guidelines considering legal/ethical issues (privacy protection, data management).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
